text: "Galway Girl" is a 2017 song by English singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran and is the third single from his third studio album รท. The song topped the single charts in Iceland, Ireland and Slovenia. It went to the top 10 in Australia, Austria, Belgium, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Hungary, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Slovakia, Sweden, Switzerland and the United Kingdom and went to the top 20 in Canada, France, Italy, Malaysia and Portugal. It did poorly in the chart in the United States and in Japan where it made #53 and #67. It is a Irish folk song. == Music video == The music video was shot in Galway, Ireland. It was uploaded to YouTube on 3 May 2017. As of January 2023, the music video has over 568 million views. The music video features Irish actress Saoirse Ronan. == References == Category:2017 songs Category:Ed Sheeran songs Category:Pop songs Category:Folk songs
title: Galway Girl
